name: Peaches
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - 3 servings of other fruits
Rich in vitamins A and C
benefits: Peaches are water-rich fruits that provide natural sweetness along with vitamins, minerals, and fiber. Their high water content and natural sugars satisfy sweet cravings while supporting weight loss through low calorie density.
amount: Part of 3 daily servings of other fruits (Daily Dozen)

quotes: Balsamic syrup brings out the sweetness of the fruit. Make this refreshing salad when summer fruit and watercress are at their peak.
